Description: The mod adds a bit of flair to icons! Credits to MysticMismagius and Nidoskull for the artwork!

CheckboxSettings.Name: Enable Easter Eggs In Player Panel
CheckboxSettings.Description: Toggles whether easter egg icons appear or not in the ability panel

CheckboxSettings.Name: All Easter Eggs Are Active
CheckboxSettings.Description: Toggles whether all of the previously selected icon pack's easter eggs will be used, or only the selected icon pack's

CheckboxSettings.Name: Enable Debugging
CheckboxSettings.Description: Toggles whether the mod's logs will be displayed (keep it off, only turn on if the dev tells you to)

IntegerInputSettings.Name: Easter Egg Icon Chance
IntegerInputSettings.Description: The chance of a different than normal icon appearing for roles
